html:
11.6.18  10:07 pm   How do you feel about people trying to find or insert meaning into your music whether its there or not?

     good. what feels bad is when they try to find meaninglessness

11.6.18  9:03 pm   What is the the coolest shape in nature?

     square

11.6.18  8:45 pm   how do I start being hopeful that the future will be good and not scary

     start studying how scary and good the past was

11.6.18  8:42 pm   How can I enjoy the things I like without being afraid of others thinking less of me?

     you could think less of them

11.6.18  8:09 pm   may you give us the letters of the next song's title so we can unscramble them?

     wow, on lsd

11.6.18  7:31 pm   Would you ever write a 10 minute song?

     it would probably be something more than a song in that case

11.6.18  7:13 pm   which is better, a mechanical pencil or a pen?

     what is the task

11.6.18  6:24 pm   What is the weirdest video you have made? (besides your documentaries)

     good firetruck

11.6.18  5:58 pm   thank you... everywhere i go today on the internet i get accosted... they're telling me to VOTE... and i'm too young to vote!!!

     they are trying to work up your appetite, by the time you are old enough

11.6.18  4:51 pm   what's your favorite soup?

     hot lava / magma

11.6.18  4:38 pm   whats your thoughts on boots

     they can be a very interesting size

11.6.18  4:13 pm   why is it called a drive through when u gotta stop

     because drive through is the most important part, other wise everyone would still be there

11.6.18  4:05 pm   Do you think your success has reduced or hindered your creativity ?

     challenges it

      Do you have more or less drive now that you have international acclaim ?

     more

11.6.18  3:33 pm   do your songs have incredibly deep meanings

     hopefully

      and story like what the Genius annotation of LDDDDDDO says,

     never read it

      or are they just fun things to make that don't have a message or meaning?

     there is as much meaning as possible. i bought a meaning enhancer to run all the meaning through before it goes into the song, but i am thinking of getting a more powerful one if necessary

11.6.18  3:31 pm   Would you ever consider being part of project (show, movie, soundtrack, etc.)

     yes

     or do you plan to keep making only solo videos forever?

     i hope not

11.6.18  2:49 pm   Whats your taste in video games?

     lightly toasted

11.6.18  2:36 pm   who do yuo think will win the elections?

     from the ads i see, only one person is running. so that guy

11.6.18  2:32 pm   was the point of your documentaries to prove that you can learn what you need to know about history in fewer than 20 minutes and not have to learn it for years in school?

     i didn't even learn it in school anyway. the reason i made that one 20 minutes is for 2 reasons, 1 is so it wouldn't waste more than 20 minutes of your time, and the other reason is so it wouldn't waste more than 11 months of my life

11.6.18  2:15 pm   Is the "music school" video a reference to something you experienced in life or just your opinion?

     neither

11.6.18  2:07 pm   was the current song (the one you're currently working on) written in 2013?

     no

11.6.18  1:53 pm   What would happen is the thing wasn't a thing and was actually a thing?

     that's exactly right

11.6.18  1:43 pm   Hey I know you said that sometimes your perfectionism gets in the way things

     i hvae a bull dozer

      but I think it's the mistakes in thing swhich make things unique? Just putting out there as something to consider in case you haven't before

     that is the subject/topic of most of my work

11.6.18  1:26 pm   if you could have anyone as president, who would you want?

     you

11.6.18  1:17 pm   are there any secrets hidden on this website?

     you

11.6.18  11:35 am   How do I move on from a huge stupid mistake that I made?

     make a more stupid huge mistake, to make the first one look smaller

11.6.18  11:01 am   I feel like sharing my music is something super personal I don't know why but I feel very vulnerable if people want to hear my music, and that always makes me feel like it's not good enough to share with anyone. Have you ever had feelings like that? How do I overcome this?

     if you put it somewhere where they can find it, and let them find it at their own pace, i think you will have a much more peaceful and enjoyable time, and feel more empowered also

11.6.18  10:45 am   how do I get over a breakup?

     start an interesting project. even if it's not interesting, that will be interesting because most projects are interesting so if you think you've found a project which is not interesting that would be interesting

11.6.18  10:36 am   What is the least coolest word you can think of?

     oh you are trying to trick me into saying a very uncool word

11.6.18  10:05 am   What's the best way to have better time management?

     just start managing a small little amount of time first. then gradually start to manage more and more time

     What if majority of the time I'm busy with school/projects and I still have to do homework?

     manage all that time, as well as the time left over

11.6.18  9:32 am   I love your anagrams page, do you think you could ever write a song where every verse is an anagram?

     every verse of every song is an anagram. also the chorus and the other parts

11.6.18  9:23 am   What do you recommend I eat for dinnner

     peaches

11.6.18  8:45 am   what makes you mad?

     even and odd numbers, particulary when they are used together

11.6.18  8:34 am   you put Tom Jobim as Jazz, but I think he's style is Bossa Nova

     i did not put jobim as jazz. any song can be done any way. it's even hard to name the ways but sometimes ways remind you of other things

11.6.18  8:25 am   what is your favourite typeface/font?

     plaid

11.6.18  8:03 am   2019 schedule idea: do 28 music videos within the first week so that you can relax and spread out their releases every 2 weeks for all of 2019, and then you can use the free time to do other stuff, like more music videos

     that's great but why do i have to wait until 2019 to start

11.6.18  7:18 am   bill how are we expected to decipher that word salad of the next song's words

     not

11.6.18  7:17 am   Bill, what do you get nervous about?

     staying calm

11.6.18  6:42 am   what do you think of absurdism

     it can be a useful tactic in business negotiations

11.6.18  5:25 am   is a snog like a song but with a twist?

     almost

11.6.18  4:19 am   how many covers are you planning on doing because I love your original content and we'd all like more
but as long as you are happy and doing what you love best
also, your music just brightens up my gloomy days, thank you for existing

     i have always wanted to do many many many many many covers, in fact one day i made a list of all the covers i wanted to do, it was about 800. that was back before i realized i couldn't record 800 songs in a day (i was assuming i could get it done in a day or so)

11.6.18  1:25 am   What are your thoughts on "all right" vs "alright"

     perhaps they could alfight

11.6.18  12:39 am   My friend and I want to know if you put the period inside or outside the quotation marks. 

     [bob ross voice] "in your world"

11.6.18  12:04 am   I wonder what question Damien skipped from ''maybe I could eat blade of grass'' video . Do ya know it? 

     it was 'what question does damien skip'

11.5.18  11:47 pm   Weirdest reoccurring dream?

     people keep asking me questions

11.5.18  11:37 pm   favorite thing to do besides anything to do with music?

     things with words

11.5.18  11:37 pm   ur stuck on a stranded island.

     that's not true but ok

      you can only bring one beverage with you that isn't water. What drink r u bringing?

     bring it where? i thought you said i was stuck, and couldn't go anywhere

11.5.18  11:17 pm   How do I know if it's love?

     it's always love

11.5.18  10:25 pm   Is your mind just inundated with music all day everyday?

     yes

      Or does it ebb and flow?

     yes

11.5.18  10:05 pm   Would you say you are one with the universe?

     2

11.5.18  10:00 pm   favorite brass instrument?

     monkey
